Articles.Content: Is there any mod that muffles sound effects when in vacuum? Many realistic space movies and games have this, but Kerbal doesn't.

https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/179579-wip110x-rocket-sound-enhancement-v053-unmuted/

This mod does just that and it is really cool! I use it myself and It has options to muffle the rockets more if you still think they're to loud.

3 hours ago, virtualpolecat said:

https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/179579-wip110x-rocket-sound-enhancement-v053-unmuted/

This mod does just that and it is really cool! I use it myself and It has options to muffle the rockets more if you still think they're to loud.

Oh, wow, awesome! Last time I checked the mod just did engine effects. Thank you!
